title: A generalization of the rational rough Heston approximation. (arXiv:2310.09181v1 [q-fin.CP])
abstract: We extend the rational approximation of the solution of the rough Heston fractional ODE in [GR19] to the case of the Mittag-Leffler kernel. We provide numerical evidence of the convergence of the solution.
context:
Title: A generalization of the rational rough Heston approximation. (arXiv:2310.09181v1 [q-fin.CP])
Abstract: We extend the rational approximation of the solution of the rough Heston fractional ODE in [GR19] to the case of the Mittag-Leffler kernel. We provide numerical evidence of the convergence of the solution.
translated_abstract: 我们将理性逼近从[GR19]中的粗Heston分数ODE扩展到Mittag-Leffler核情况。我们提供了数值证据表明解的收敛性。
tldr: 这个论文将理性逼近从粗Heston分数ODE扩展到Mittag-Leffler核情况，并提供了数值证据表明解的收敛性。
en_tdlr: This paper extends the rational approximation from the rough Heston fractional ODE to the case of the Mittag-Leffler kernel, and provides numerical evidence of the convergence of the solution.
